website_summaries.verdict: A versatile option with features that are comparable to more expensive models.
pros: Double ionic generator for even smoother, frizz-free styling and damage reduction
High-density nano comb stimulates hair follicles and massages the scalp for healthier hair
Features 16 heat settings for all hair types
Easy-to-use temperature control with temperature lock and digital display
cons: At 60 seconds, the heating time is slightly longer than competitors

customer_reviews.title: YALL.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak highly enough about this brush! The only negative is that I didn’t discover it sooner! It normally takes anywhere from 2 1/2 - 3 hours to straighten my hair, and this brush got the job done in only half an hour. HALF AN HOUR YALL. I just about cried. I would give this product ten stars if I could! 💕
customer_reviews.author: Brooke K

customer_reviews.title: Straightened 4C Hair on a 5-yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this brush! My daughter's hair is thick-4C. I had to dry & detangle her hair 1st as this is not a hair dryer. But look how nice it looks! I did bump the ends to give it some curl. It's not as flat as a flat iron would be but it allowed me to get close to her scalp without burning her. And the fullness is lovely. It cuts flat ironing time in half! I use it during the week to freshen my look in less than 10 minutes. Great purchase, fast shipping, would recommend for touch-ups, pre-teens doing their own hair, and parents of little girls.
customer_reviews.author: Glorya Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so hesitant to buy this one. I've tried another brand of these and it made my hair look like it was blow dried only. This one is super easy to use and it made my hair look great. Took me less than 5 mins to do 1/4 of my hair...easily half the time it normally takes. And the glove left my finger tips in tact. This worked on my curls, which are looser, and my daughter's curls which are tighter. For the value you just cannot beat this!
customer_reviews.author: JDOT R

customer_reviews.title: A great hair straightener
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I like it better than my Chi straightener. The MiroPure hair brush straightener works very quickly. I have long, thick, curly hair that tends to frizz. I can section off my hair and run this brush through my hair and have sleek and smooth in about 15 minutes! And it always looks so shiny after I straighten, plus it lasts for a long time. I section my hair, spray it with heat protector, run a regular brush through it then run the straightening brush through it. ( It works much faster if you brush the snarls out first). I recommend this product to anyone with crazy hair that wants smooth hair quickly!
customer_reviews.author: 2 Girls

customer_reviews.title: Mine was faulty, buzzing sound when plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: I️ wanted to like this so badly. I️ read all the great reviews and was super excited. I️ think mine was faulty, as soon as I️ plugged it in it started making a buzzing sound, it freaked me out so I️ returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Brush arrived with hairs in it
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even get the chance to use and love or hate this product. It arrived nicely wrapped but when I removed it from the box I noticed that one piece was broken off. Upon further inspection I realized that there were hairs in the bristles. I had never used it before therefore I assume that I received a used product. I was so disappointed and, frankly, grossed out. Over 2,000 reviews and a 4.5 star rating - I was so excited to try this product! What a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders in less than 10 minutes and at a great PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST hair straightener!! I've gone through several hair straighteners in the past few years and I've had this one for a couple months and it works great!!! I use it 6-7 times a week and I can straighten my long hair in less than 10 minutes. My hair has some wave to it, but after I shower at night, I brush my hair out and let it air dry (and it looks ratty, stringy, poofy, and just a hot mess). Then I straighten it once it's all dry and boom in less than 10 minutes my hair is done. No tangles and no pulling (like a regular hair straightener does). I would definitely recommend!!! ❤❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Mom of GIRLS

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to use as one might be led to believe
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this after some Buzzfeed listicle insisted that it would speed up my morning beautification process, but unfortunately, that's not the case. The listicle had claimed that straightening and de-frizzing my hair would be as easy as simply brushing it, but in fact, unlike a traditional flat iron, I found that I had to section out my hair with clips and brush each section repeatedly to get it straight and sleek, whereas with my trusty flat-iron, it was one swipe and done. I ended up returning this, as it was simply not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this item. I used it once, and then it wouldn’t turn on anymore. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. I saw and read such amazing reviews that this completely straightened their unruly hair. I myself have fine/medium hair with a loose curl/wave that gets frizzy sometimes. I thought this would get it contained enough to wear down without feeling like medusa when it gets too crazy. However, not only did this not do the job, it also makes a weird sound. The sound is like this weird tickingish sound and it made me hesitant to use it. So far the noise doesn't' seem to be related to anything that could potentially damage my hair, but I doubt I'll use it enough to find out.
customer_reviews.author: J_schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Faster and better than an iron on my short hair
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Glides through my hair easily and didn't create fly aways or frizz. I've only used to refresh pre straightened hair so far, but it touched up my slept on hair perfectly. Update: I’ve now used it after washing my hair and love it! So much faster than the iron and I actually feel like it does better in some ways. I have short, chin length hair and this does a better job than an iron on the shorter under hair in the back. Takes out the wave with no iron marks and leaves my hair straight without being flat.
customer_reviews.author: RMcintyre

customer_reviews.title: If you have thick frizzy/curly hair buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product but after watching the video and using it for the first time I’m sold. I have long thick curly to kinky blonde hair and it smooths in seconds and you don’t have to take small pieces like a flat iron. I do suggest using a heat resistant spray prior.. Also, the amount of time it takes for me to do my hair is cut in half. Do wear the glove that it comes with on the hand that you use to grasp your hair as your hair will get very hot. I use mine at a temp of 450!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mahardy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a much more expensive (double!) hot brush to start out with. I ended up returning it because it didn't have a temperature lock on it; every time I brushed through my hair, my thumb was pressing the heat setting. This MiroPure brush has a lock, and is HALF THE PRICE - and works just as well as the expensive brand. I'm very happy I purchased this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: It's actually 4.5 stars! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: LOVING THIS! Got this today and immediately tried it out. It worked amazing. Heats you up quickly and straightens really fast, and unlike other straighteners the form of a brush makes it a lot easier on your wrist. Left my hair really smooth and silky unlike others ... and trust me I've had so MANY ... happy with this purchase. The only reason I don't give it 5 full stars is because i wish it had some sort of lock option for the temperature so that i don't accidentally lower the temperature while straightening. ( please ignore those dry ends, they are a result of bad coloring decisions and small care haha)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: MiroPure 2 Review
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for the right brush straightener for my daughter's type of hair. Finally, decided to try this because of the price and the reviews. My daughter's is between wavy and curly and very frizzy at most times. Received it yesterday and tried it on my daughter's hair and it only took 25 minutes whereas it normally takes 45 or more minutes with a normal hair straightener. Were both so pleased at the ease of use and the time we saved. Her hair even looks healthy afterwards. I definitely recommend it. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Marlaine

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months only using about a dozen times
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item on July 16, 2019, used it a few times since then. I plugged it in today and get an error message and it doesn't heat up. Would not recommend buying this. Apparently the undo of time to return it has passed so I am out the money I pad for it. DO NOT BUY!! I am still waiting for Amazon to contact me about replacing or returning this item. When i submitted my review i got a message that said i would be contacted by amazon or the seller and I have not heard from either and its been a week.
customer_reviews.author: PS06

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a regular hair straightener thinking this will do the job much quicker. I would say it does get the job done, but I still spend quite a bit of time, since you still do it in smaller portions of hair. You can’t just brush your whole hair without separating into portions. The other annoying thing, compared to a hair straightener, you have to always hold the end of the strand with the other hand. I would say saved me a bit of time but it’s not easier than a regular straightener.
customer_reviews.author: Gayane

customer_reviews.title: Great results without a lot of time or effort!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was so excited to try this when it came that I used it on my 2nd day dirty, naturally curly hair and it seriously straightened it in 15 min or less...I used the 370 setting for the sides and 390 for the back since it's a bit thicker than my sides...the only drawback that I could see was that it might be difficult to keep clean....the bristles are really close together, which is great for straightening, but not so much for cleaning. It's still way worth it...I can't use a straight iron to save my life without burning myself a hundred times so I love this product. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: JDEaster

customer_reviews.title: Just okay...
customer_reviews.text: Technically, it does everything it says it does...I gave 4 stars because it’s EXACTLY like using a regular hair straightener...which I already had. I thought being a brush it would be faster...it’s not, in fact- I can straighten my hair faster with a regular flat iron. For me personally, it’s just a flat iron with bristles...and the bristles get in the way and cause you to have to move slower. So, does it straighten your hair- YES. Is it ANY different than every other flat iron already out there- NO. If you have a flat iron, you don’t need this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A Corvey

customer_reviews.title: Just a fancy brush
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair in a bob style. This smooths a little bit but that's about it. It doesn't hold the hair tight like a flat iron so it doesn't really do much else and there's no way to get much of any actual shape. I guess I should have realized that it's really just a brush with some heat, so not sure what I was thinking. I got caught up in the high ratings hype. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Kim in Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do anything.
customer_reviews.text: Yet another straightening product that works for everyone else on the planet except me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: OMFG WOW.... It’s magic or something... TA DAAAA!!
customer_reviews.text: OOOOHHHH MY F****** GOSH!!!!!! This thing is amazing.... I looked at the reviews and although I seen my textured hair, I still wasn’t truly convinced.... I have some of the NAPPIEST hair ever, lbvs. This miraclePURE is beyond amazing, plus that price, WOW!!! If you have nappy, THICK hair... buy this, you won’t regret it... I guess no more salon for me... what would normally take at least 2 hours at the salon just took me, I promise, all of ten mins... also, to get close to your edges you have to turn the brush to the side... this thing is magically, I’m still flabbergasted, not one burn and I was literally touching my scalp.... JUST WOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mela

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Used it on mostly dry hair. My hair is long and fluffy (think Samoan type) when I don't put product in my hair. It took a long time to straighten. Lots of hair breakage bc of the pressure I had to use, glove wasn't very effective (heat through the glove was still too hot), didn't straighten the roots well enough and the heat burned my scalp, temperature buttons on the handle kept getting pressed. There should be a slide cover over the buttons. Took too many slides through my hair. Finally gave up and will go back to using mousse. I think the standard hair straightener with two plates is the best for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kawibunga

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy here...
customer_reviews.text: Went to use it for a second time, and product doesn't heat up. Now I have to go out of my way to find a drop off to return item for a reimbursement...
customer_reviews.author: J. Olivas

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I would consider this straightening brush almost perfect for me. Having thick curly hair is normally impossible to straighten after ive let it air dry. But this little beauty has made it possible. With the heat guard tooth combs I dont worry about my scalp getting burnt like I would with a regular flat iron. The addition of having a hear glove is just so considerate by the sellers. My only issue is having the temperature control buttons where i have to place my fingers on the handle. Maybe if they were lower down it would be better. But apart from that im really pleased and impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Welds

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the brush tonight and was very impressed with how quickly it heated up, how easy it was to use and how quickly I was done with my hair. I have shoulder length hair that's got just enough wave to make it look like crap unless I straighten it. It usually takes me 20 -30mins to straighten depending on how cute I'm trying to look. I just achieved the same results in 5 minutes. When registering the warranty there was a glitch and I was able to immediately contact support thru chat and the agent Dianne resolved my problem in minutes. It's 1am PST and there was a real human available for chat! I couldn't be more impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Skondin

customer_reviews.title: Quick but makes a lot of static
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Easy to use, I don't have to section off my hair like I do with my straightener. My arms don't get tired. Cons- leaves my hair full of crazy static. I normally don't put product in after, but I have to use something if I use this straightening brush because my hair sticks up all over. It's also a little tricky to get the ends flat. I tend to use this if I'm going to quickly straighten my hair and then pull it back or put it up, and my regular one if my hair will just be down. It's also a little annoying to get the hair out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I only used this once on dry hair that I washed the day before. It was only that one time that made me write this review and put my flat iron away. I hate doing my hair. Always wear it up because it’s impossible to iron completely straight, even after blow drying, and I can’t stand the time spent. This literally took a few minutes longer than brushing my hair. I did it in two sections, left and right. My hair looks fantastic! This is my new favorite thing. My hair is shiny, and has no frizz, which is what I was afraid of. I love this product and see why it has so many high reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow. I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing is awesome. More than what I expected. I did my hair in under 20 minutes on the highest setting. I have thick long hair that is about 28 inches long. I used it like a brush, didn't burn scalp. It didn't get my hair completely flat and sleek. Its flat but has some volume to it. Definitely make sure you brush your hair out well and this thing will glide through your hair. really great product ant took a minute to heat up. This is definitely going to be used as a everyday look. But for special occasions I will still use my flat iron. Came well packaged and came a day early.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great brush straightener
customer_reviews.text: What a great brush strengthener. It took no time for me to straighten my daughters hair. And she didn’t complain about the heat, which she has done in the past when I used a flat iron. I totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GLDT

customer_reviews.title: Does not straighten hair
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed with this product. I have this medium fine beach curly/wavy hair. I tried to use this brush to straighten my hair and it left it frizzy and not very straight. I even followed the directions to a T. I usually stick with well known brands but I decided to change when I saw the reviews. Unfortunately this product did not work well for me at all and I wasted money. It’s already in the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Kia Chun

customer_reviews.title: Split ends
customer_reviews.text: This works great on roots but not so much on your ends. I have 2c curls, i used it on 350 on damp to dry hair but it doesn’t leave silky ends, otherwise, it really damaged my ends to the point i got split ends, even when brushing in round motion and had applied heat protection. I just use the spin brush to get bouncy silky ends instead of brushing all the way with this device. Other than that, is well made, it heats up quick, is not heavy at all, it comes nicely wrapped with a pouch and a glove which you will need and instructions to activate the 1 yr warranty.
customer_reviews.author: ExoticSunflower

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this device. I have really coarse, think wavy/curly hair that likes to curl. I've read a lot about brush straighteners but never thought they would work on me. I was able to purchase this device with a coupon code for about $25 so figured why not try it. It works great! I'm past the age of wanting pin straight hair--so that's not my goal--and I've not tried to achieve it. I'm just aiming for mostly straight, and no frizz and this fits the bill--It literally takes me about 5 mins or less in the morning to use this device on dry hair.. huge time saver. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mar Phil

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Its so much easier to use than a flat iron, but it doesnt get as straight as with a flat iron but it looks naturally straight instead of pin straight. Also doesnt help against humidity! It was raining & then the sun came out and my hair almost instantly started to get wavy and frizzy. I have fine curly hair with a lot of hair... i even tried using it as a hairbrush without sectioning my hair and it still got straight! Picture: thats after having my hair in a ponytail all day!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cole

customer_reviews.title: One Star upgraded to four stars
customer_reviews.text: The teeth broke the first time I used it. Update March 2019 - I was contacted by the company with an offer to resolve my previous review. They sent me a brand new unit. I was shocked by how well it works. I didn't even have to use the highest heat setting to straighten my hair. I was able to do my hair really quickly as well. Wow! My only quibble with the product is that it's difficult to clean because of its design. I'll figure it out. Well done to the Miro Pure company for their proactive customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Adelita Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: I have a curly hair and I always hated the flat iron for 2 reasons: I have a lot of air and always took soooo long to get my hair done and it never came out the way I wanted. This brush, Ive been bragging about to y daughter, my partner and friends; since I bough it. Its easy to use and I literally can get my hair done in less than 10min. I highly recommend it if you want to save time and have your hair well done : )
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline B. Glazebrook

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed by this product. I have had many straighteners in my time, but this one is hands down my all time favorite. I have mid back length thick wavy hair and I can straighten my hair quicker using this than my regular straightener and it gives my hair the same sleek straight look....way quicker. My sister used it and she has shoulder length very curly hair and was impressed at how easy and sleek this was. She ordered one also. I would buy this again and think i will get one to keep in my gym bag. LOVE THIS product!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimakins

customer_reviews.title: Gets REALLY hot
customer_reviews.text: It made my thick curly hair nice but it had to be at the highest setting to do so. Wore two gloves not to burn hands and hair gets so hot can't touch it. I am afraid such heat will damage my hair over time. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorrema

customer_reviews.title: Straightens, but does not flatten out like a classic straightener
customer_reviews.text: I have long curly hair and bought this to help cut down some styling time. Let me say.. it works. 100% works. I blowdry my hair for 20 mins (it’s very thick so this leaves it pretty moist still) then take this brush to it. I section it in three sections, run the brush through. Once it’s done I touch up with a classic straightener to really flatten the hair out. THIS BRUSH DOES NOT FLATTEN YOUR HAIR LIKE A CLASSSIC STRAIGHTENER. BUT.. it does smooth, dry, and tame curls pretty dang well. This is great for a “straight but not perfectly flattened” look.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia in CO

customer_reviews.title: does NOT get close to the scalp
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get a hot COMB replacement with this hot brush. It gets hot enough for my course hair and warms up fast. you have to comb out both sides of the hair in order to get it straight so if you take out a section your have to run the comb twice unlike like flat irons that on have heating elements on two sides, this makes a huge difference and you may need more than one appliance to get a quality straight effect. BRING BACK HOT TOOLS pressing iron!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had gotten this YEARS ago
customer_reviews.text: I have unruly curly long hair. Frizz for days and it would take me at least 45 mins to straighten with a basic straightener. A friend posted on FB that this brush straightened her hair in like 2 minutes so I bought it. Seriously, all my hair is straight in 15-20 mins. And hair is not flat! Other straighteners make hair pin straight and so flat but this leaves or creates volume somehow. I didn’t take little bitty sections to straighten I just brushed but a lot slower. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not very good after all
customer_reviews.text: First off.. when I got this, I was very excited about it.. BUT, the free heat resistance glove didn't come with it. I tested it out first after getting it, it seemed to work fine.. next day after washing my hair, drying it.. I went to try it out.. Well, set it at 430 and ended up burning my neck after trying to get it out of my hair, it pulled my hair and fried it so bad, it's a mess now. It makes my hair more frizzier than before and sucks on curly hair. I'm so not happy. Oh, and be careful of smelling of hot plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tina A.

customer_reviews.title: HANDS DOWN THE BEST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So let me just say I am skeptical of eveything and my sister actually bought this brush and she let me try it out.. I WAS SHOOK! As a stay at home mom of 2 I literally never have time to do my hair! But this brush ya'll..... IT'S A LIFE SAVER!!!! I have thick curly hair and I straightened my hair in 40 mins tops and thats because I was taking my time! I definitely would recommend to this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Marie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate!!!!! Best hot brush for thick hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS BRUSH!!!!!!!!! I have spent over $300 on top of the line, flat irons for my hair. NOTHING has compared to this brush! It’s quick, easy and straightens my hair so fast! It lasts ALL day and IM just in love love love! Don’t even hesitate to get these! And then there’s the price! WOW! Just WOW! I have thick, wavy hair black hair. My hair is poker straight after using this!! This was the best purchase I’ve ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: works well on thick hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick and wavy/curly hair. It takes me about an hour and a half to straighten my hair using a regular straightening iron, but with this brush I was done in twelve minutes! It was way easier and faster, and the results were just as good as a regular straightening iron. I only had to section my hair in half instead of, like, five parts, and it brushed easily through and worked very well. I'd recommend this brush to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Shine and Control
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. I have short hair and yet can easily straighten my hair without burning myself. It leaves my hair soft and incredibly shiny. Heats up very quickly and you can lock in the temp you need. Great for all hair types and is also light and easy to manipulate. Also was a great price and super quick delivery. All together, it is a great straightening brush with many bells and whistles and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Xdoormat

customer_reviews.title: Like a new age hot comb
customer_reviews.text: I have 4b African natural hair. I blew the hair out with a dryer that has a comb. Parted my hair in four sections and then passsd the brush through each section twice. It will get your hair straighter but it will not straighten it out like a flat iron but it does seem to do less Damage. For me I just need the hair straighter so it can be braided so it works.
customer_reviews.author: Common$ense

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my 3 year old one which was bought right as ‘hair brush straighteners’ we’re becoming popular so my first one was not the best. This goes smooth right through my mid-back thick hair, no pulling. Doesn’t straighten as well as a traditional straightener obviously, I still have some waves in my hair after using it, but I’m sure it’s less damaging than a clamp and pull straightener and the style these days is less about pin straight hair anyway.
customer_reviews.author: AJD

customer_reviews.title: Quick straightener brush!  Best tool I’ve owned in a LONG time!
customer_reviews.text: This brush straightener is awesome. At first it was making a little buzzing noise so I contacted the company right away and they had no problems replacing it! The first pic (the half and half) shows my natural hair and then after a quick 5 minute brush through with the straightener. The second one is about 10 minutes. This is remarkable for the amount of hair I have! I have about every tool ever made for hair and this one is my go-to for everyday styling! I’ve honestly never been so impressed with a hair tool before!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pros: heats up quick and the temperature is good enough. Cons: the temperature buttons are exactly where your fingers holding it tightly while using it so it is easy to heat it higher by mistake don't realize it and burn your hair! The head of the brush is so heavy. The application is not like brushing your hair easily.. you have to hold it tight with one hand and hold and strech the hair with the other hand. Otherwise the heat pads doesn't touch your hair. Does it straighten? Yes but in more time than a regular flat iron. It is like brushing your hair over and over.. that also makes hair oily at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Emine Can

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick, curly or frizzy hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ll try to make this short. If you have the kind of hair that when you straighten it stays poofy and doesn’t lay flat: this product is for you. For the first time in my life I can shake my head and it moves like in hair product commercials. I have shoulder length hair and the process took <10 min. I’m not sure what sort of sorcery is imbued in this thing, but it’s 100% worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BetaJim

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan!  Did not straighten my hair any better than a flat iron.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical ( And still am), I read lots of good reviews and decided to bite the bullet and try it. Unfortunately this product does not work for me. It does not straighten my hair any better than my flat iron and it is heavy to hold after using so long that my wrist and thumb started hurting. I could not get a good grip on it without my fingers hitting the control buttons. I was really hoping this would work at straightening my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!!!
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a very cute box. Love that it has a 12 month warranty. It's not super bulky.its very stylish. I'm glad it comes with the glove! Also, for my black women, I can say that it does work! I was skeptical about getting it because I have very very coarse hair!! I wouldn't say x out the curling iron. But it does assist with unruly hair. Also, if you have extremely thick hair like mine......USE THE GLOVE! LOL I see why they supply it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleymarie

customer_reviews.title: Straightened. Except for the ends.
